description: City: Athens, GAKing of Pops makes the best pops around featuring traditional as well as new, fun flavors. We emphasize local and organic ingredients, for a healthy, top quality treat.Our mission is to provide an ecologically responsible, fresh, all natural frozen treat in a fun neighborhood environment.Our goal is to be a waste free company. All of our fruit waste goes to community gardens; most other supplies are recycled. We strive to throw away less than one bag of trash per week.
name: King of Pops
